rules.ruleString: Incompatible with course version org unit in {50000566} with course status in {ENROLLED, INACTIVE, INTERMIT}

proh: FIT1012, MMS1402, MMS9401Not available to Faculty of Information Technology students.
description: This unit will develop the basic concepts of website authoring, from design to implementation. Students will develop skills in creating digital content which is authored to deal with the particular issues of web publishing. The unit will examine HTML/XHTML, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), the W3C Document Object Model (DOM) and JavaScript as the fundamental website authoring suite. In addition HTML embedded script languages will be used to create dynamic database driven content. The unit will also introduce wider W3C standards, web usability and web design specification.
